verses.verse: <S%G2532>Then<s%> came <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%>, which <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> with <S%G2839>defiled<s%>, that is to <S%G5123>say<s%>, with <S%G449>unwashen<s%>, <S%G5495>hands<s%>, they found <S%G3201>fault<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G3362>except<s%> they <S%G3538>wash<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G4435>oft<s%>, <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G2902>holding<s%> the <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when they come <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G58>market<s%>, <S%G3362>except<s%> they <S%G907>wash<s%>, they <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> other <S%G243>things<s%> there <S%G2076>be<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> they have <S%G3880>received<s%> to <S%G2902>hold<s%>, as the <S%G909>washing<s%> of <S%G4221>cups<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3582%G2532>pots<s%>, brasen <S%G5473>vessels<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2825>tables<s%>.

<S%G1899>Then<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1302>Why<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> with <S%G449>unwashen<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>?

He <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846%G3754>them<s%>, Well <S%G2573><s%> hath Esaias <S%G2268><s%> prophesied <S%G4395><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> hypocrites <S%G5273><s%> , as <S%G5613><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> , This <S%G3778><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> honoureth <S%G5091><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> with their lips <S%G5491><s%> , but <S%G1161><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> is <S%G568><s%> far <S%G4206><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> .
Howbeit <S%G1161><s%> in vain <S%G3155><s%> do they worship <S%G4576><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> , teaching <S%G1321><s%> for doctrines <S%G1319><s%> the commandments <S%G1778><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> .

For <S%G1063><s%> laying aside <S%G863><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> , ye hold <S%G2902><s%> the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> , as the washing <S%G909><s%> of pots <S%G3582><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cups <S%G4221><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other <S%G243><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> like things <S%G3946><s%> ye do <S%G4160><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Full well <S%G2573><s%> ye reject <S%G114><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> , that <S%G2443><s%> ye may keep <S%G5083><s%> your own <S%G5216><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%> .

For <S%G1063><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> , Honour <S%G5091><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> , Whoso curseth <S%G2551><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> , let him die <S%G5053><s%> the death <S%G2288><s%> :

But <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> , If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> shall say <S%G2036><s%> to his father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> , It is Corban <S%G2878><s%> , that is to say <S%G3603><s%> , a gift <S%G1435><s%> , by <S%G1537><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739%G1437><s%> thou mightest be profited by <S%G5623><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> ; he shall be free .

And <S%G2532><s%> ye suffer <S%G863><s%> him <S%G846><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> ought <S%G3762><s%> for his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> ;

Making <S%G208><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> of none effect <S%G208><s%> through your <S%G5216><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%> , which <S%G3739><s%> ye have delivered <S%G3860><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> like things <S%G3946><s%> do ye <S%G4160><s%> .

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> unto him, he <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Hearken <S%G191><s%> unto me <S%G3450><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> of you , and <S%G2532><s%> understand <S%G4920><s%> :

There is <S%G2076><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> from without <S%G1855><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> , that <S%G3739><s%> entering <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> him <S%G846><s%> : but <S%G235><s%> the things which come <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> him <S%G846><s%> , those <S%G1565><s%> are they <S%G2076><s%> that defile <S%G2840><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> .
If any man <S%G1536><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> , let him hear <S%G191><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he was <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%>, <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G3850>parable<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Are <S%G2075><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> without understanding <S%G801><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> ? Do ye <S%G3539><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> perceive <S%G3539><s%> , that <S%G3754><s%> whatsoever thing <S%G3956><s%> from without <S%G1855><s%> entereth <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> , it cannot <S%G3756%G1410><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> him <S%G846><s%> ;

Because <S%G3754><s%> it entereth <S%G1531><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the belly <S%G2836><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> goeth out <S%G1607><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the draught <S%G856><s%> , purging <S%G2511><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> meats <S%G1033><s%> ?
<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G3004%G3754>said<s%>, That which cometh <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> , that <S%G1565><s%> defileth <S%G2840><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> .

For <S%G1063><s%> from within <S%G2081><s%> , out of <S%G1537><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> , proceed <S%G1607><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> thoughts <S%G1261><s%> , adulteries <S%G3430><s%> , fornications <S%G4202><s%> , murders <S%G5408><s%> ,

Thefts <S%G2829><s%> , covetousness <S%G4124><s%> , wickedness <S%G4189><s%> , deceit <S%G1388><s%> , lasciviousness <S%G766><s%> , an evil <S%G4190><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> , blasphemy <S%G988><s%> , pride <S%G5243><s%> , foolishness <S%G877><s%> :
All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> evil things <S%G4190><s%> come <S%G1607><s%> from within <S%G2081><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> .

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> from <S%G1564>thence<s%> he <S%G450>arose<s%>, and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3181>borders<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> an <S%G3614>house<s%>, and would <S%G2309>have<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> it: <S%G2532>but<s%> he <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G2990>hid<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> a certain <S%G1135>woman<s%>, <S%G3739%G846>whose<s%> young <S%G2365>daughter<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, and <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G4363>fell<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%>:

<S%G1161><s%>The <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G1674>Greek<s%>, a <S%G4949>Syrophenician<s%> by <S%G1085>nation<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G2065>besought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he would cast <S%G1544>forth<s%> the <S%G1140>devil<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2364>daughter<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>her<s%>, Let <S%G863><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> be filled <S%G5526><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> meet <S%G2570><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> the children's <S%G5043><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> to cast <S%G906><s%> it unto the dogs <S%G2952><s%> .

<S%G1161>And<s%> she <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3483>Yes<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>: <S%G2532%G1063>yet<s%> the <S%G2952>dogs<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> the <S%G5132>table<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G3813>children's<s%> <S%G5589>crumbs<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>her<s%>, For <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> go thy way <S%G5217><s%> ; the devil <S%G1140><s%> is gone <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> daughter <S%G2364><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> when she was <S%G565>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>, she <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G1140>devil<s%> gone <S%G1831>out<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> her <S%G2364>daughter<s%> <S%G906>laid<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2825>bed<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, <S%G1831>departing<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3725>coasts<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon<s%>, he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G303>through<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G3725>coasts<s%> of <S%G1179>Decapolis<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G5342>bring<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> one that was <S%G2974>deaf<s%>, and had an impediment in his <S%G3424>speech<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2007>put<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> upon <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G618>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2596%G2398>aside<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%>, and <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1147>fingers<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G4429>spit<s%>, and <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> looking <S%G308>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, he <S%G4727>sighed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Ephphatha <S%G2188><s%> , that <S%G3603>is<s%>, Be <S%G1272>opened<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G189>ears<s%> were <S%G1272>opened<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1199>string<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> was <S%G3089>loosed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2980>spake<s%> <S%G3723>plain<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G1291>charged<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G2036>tell<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G3745>more<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1291>charged<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, so much the <S%G3123>more<s%> a great <S%G4054>deal<s%> they <S%G2784>published<s%> it;

<S%G2532>And<s%> were beyond <S%G5249>measure<s%> <S%G1605>astonished<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, He hath <S%G4160>done<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%>: he <S%G4160>maketh<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> the <S%G2974>deaf<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G216>dumb<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%>.
